devdoc.author: Enzyme Council <security@enzyme.finance>
devdoc.details: This will not work with a `denominationAsset` that does not transfer the exact expected amount or has an elastic supply.

params._investmentAmount: The amount of the fund's denomination asset to use to buy shares
params._minSharesQuantity: The minimum quantity of shares to buy with the _investmentAmount

params._requestOwners: The owners of the pending shares requests

params._requestOwner: The address of the user that creates the request

returns.requestInfo_: The request info created by the user

returns.isRequestExecutor_: True if _who is a request executor

devdoc.title: AuthUserExecutedSharesRequestorLib Contract

cancelRequest().notice: Cancels the shares request of the caller

createRequest(uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a shares request for the caller

getSharesRequestInfoForOwner(address).notice: Gets the request info of a user

init(address).notice: Initializes a proxy instance that uses this library

isRequestExecutor(address).notice: Checks whether an account is a request executor

userdoc.notice: Provides the logic for AuthUserExecutedSharesRequestorProxy instances, in which shares requests are manually executed by a permissioned user
